Text:
I've seen it time and again with these posts.. so before maron asks "Why is this so F''king huge!?!" 

Folks, it's a perfect Blu-ray ISO image.  Full movie, features, etc.  made for burning to replicate a retail copy.

If you want a 4gb version, or a 700mb version -- go get it -- one probably exists... but these images are great for people who want a replica of the retail disc.
Cinavia protection in full effect on this release.
